channel.title: sports on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in sports on Ross A. Baker

item.title: Big Ten Fight Songs
item.description: I am a lifelong Midwesterner. Fight songs are a big deal in the Big Ten. I played the “Minnesota Rouser” in my high school band in Illinois. “Indiana Our Indiana” is objectively the best, as measured by the fact I have two degrees from there and zero degrees from anywhere else. The conference isn’t as Midwestern as it used to be, but it’s nice to have the 9 10 11 13 17 other songs gathered to sing along with whenever someone scores on Purdue.
